Name: Challenger Deep
Ingredients: 30 ml Mancino Vermouth di Torino Chinato
7.5 ml Green Chartreuse (or alternative herbal liqueur)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: This aperitif style cocktail has chocolaty notes with faint rich herbal complexity from the Chartreuse.
History: Created in 2015 by Kyle Godbey at Home, Richmond, VA, USA
